Articles.Content: How can I set the current action set (default, 1, 2, 3, or 4) in flight from code?

Vessel.GroupOverride is the index of (Vessel.OverrideActionControl) the currently set action group.
Vessel.OverrideActionControl is an array of the action groups for the vessel.
Vessel.SetGroupOverride(int newGroup) - sets the action group.

Thanks a lot!

Now, I can add action set support to my AutoActions mod.
